AT.name: Chasing Aurora
AT.description: Verwirkliche in Chasing Aurora den Traum vom Fliegen. In diesem auf realistischer Physik basierenden 2D-Flugaction-Spiel kämpfen bis zu fünf Spieler in Turnieren, die drei Disziplinen umfassen. Im Einzelspielermodus musst du im Wettlauf mit der Zeit neue Levels freischalten. Lass dich dabei in der einzigartigen Welt von Chasing Aurora nicht von Gewittern, Wasserfällen, Eiszapfen und Felslawinen überraschen.

AU.name: Chasing Aurora
AU.description: Experience the dream of flight in Chasing Aurora, a physics-based 2D aerial action game. Up to five players fight in tournaments that span three disciplines. The single player mode is a race against the clock to unlock new levels. Evade lightning storms, waterfalls, icicles and rock slides in the unique world of Chasing Aurora.

BG.name: Chasing Aurora
BG.description: Experience the dream of flight in Chasing Aurora, a physics-based 2D aerial action game. Up to five players fight in tournaments that span three disciplines. The single player mode is a race against the clock to unlock new levels. Evade lightning storms, waterfalls, icicles and rock slides in the unique world of Chasing Aurora.

BE.name: Chasing Aurora
BE.description: Volez comme un oiseau dans Chasing Aurora. Dans ce jeu d'action aérien en 2D basé sur les lois de la physique, jusqu'à cinq joueurs peuvent s'affronter au cours de tournois mêlant trois disciplines. Le mode solo consiste en une course contre la montre pour débloquer de nouveaux niveaux. Échappez à la foudre, aux chutes d'eau, aux glaçons et aux éboulements dans le monde unique de Chasing Aurora.

ES.name: Chasing Aurora
ES.description: Vive el sueño de volar en Chasing Aurora. En este juego aéreo en 2D basado en la física, hasta cinco jugadores luchan en torneos que abarcan tres disciplinas. El modo para un jugador es una carrera a contrarreloj para desbloquear niveles nuevos. Esquiva tormentas de rayos, cascadas, carámbanos y desprendimientos de rocas en el mundo único de Chasing Aurora.

IT.name: Chasing Aurora
IT.description: Realizza il sogno di volare in Chasing Aurora. In questo gioco di volo e azione, realizzato in grafica 2D, fino a cinque giocatori si fronteggiano in tornei che abbracciano tre discipline. La modalità giocatore singolo consiste in una gara contro il tempo per sbloccare nuovi livelli. Evita tempeste di fulmini, cascate, stalattiti di ghiaccio e lastroni di roccia nell'incredibile mondo di Chasing Aurora.

NL.name: Chasing Aurora
NL.description: Altijd al gedroomd om te kunnen vliegen? Chasing Aurora maakt het mogelijk. In deze 2D-actiegame met geweldige physics kunnen maximaal 5 spelers het luchtruim kiezen voor toernooien die bestaan uit drie disciplines. In de singleplayer neem je het op tegen de klok om nieuwe levels vrij te spelen. Ontwijk bliksemschichten, watervallen, ijspegels en rotslawines in de unieke wereld van Chasing Aurora.

NZ.name: Chasing Aurora
NZ.description: Experience the dream of flight in Chasing Aurora, a physics-based 2D aerial action game. Up to five players fight in tournaments that span three disciplines. The single player mode is a race against the clock to unlock new levels. Evade lightning storms, waterfalls, icicles and rock slides in the unique world of Chasing Aurora.

PL.name: Chasing Aurora
PL.description: Experience the dream of flight in Chasing Aurora, a physics-based 2D aerial action game. Up to five players fight in tournaments that span three disciplines. The single player mode is a race against the clock to unlock new levels. Evade lightning storms, waterfalls, icicles and rock slides in the unique world of Chasing Aurora.

PT.name: Chasing Aurora
PT.description: Vive o sonho de voar em Chasing Aurora. Neste jogo de física em 2D com muita ação no ar, até cinco jogadores podem competir em torneios de três disciplinas. O modo para um jogador é uma luta contra o tempo para desbloquear novos níveis. Evita relâmpagos, quedas de água, estalactites, cascatas e deslizamentos de pedras, no mundo ímpar de Chasing Aurora.

RU.name: Chasing Aurora
RU.description: Осуществите мечту о полете в игре Chasing Aurora. В этом 2D-экшне с реалистичной физикой могут сражаться до 5 игроков в трех режимах. Одиночная игра — это гонка на время, в ходе которой игрок получает доступ к новым уровням. Избегайте гроз, дождя, сосулек и камнепада в уникальном мире игры Chasing Aurora.

movies.name: Chasing Aurora: трейлер, посвященный выходу игры
